name: Renegade Row
how_to_perform:
1. Start with a dumbbell in each hand, held at your sides.
2. Bend your knees and lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight.
3. Lift one dumbbell off the ground and keep it close to your body, then perform a rowing motion with that arm only. 
4. At the same time, hold the other dumbbell in place with the opposite hand.
5. Continue alternating arms with each rep.
short_summary: Renegade rows are an upper body exercise that targets both arms and shoulders through alternating rows while holding one dumbbell steady.
